Content: Minister Gamini Jayawickrema Perera says that legal action will be taken against those who distort and disrespect Buddhism. He said this to the media after meeting the Mahanayakas of the Malwathu and Asgiri Chapters. Minister Gamini Jayawickrema Perera met the Maha Nayaka of Malwathu Chapter Most Venerable Thibbotuwawe Sri Sumangala Thera at the Malwathu Maha Vihara. Thereafter he called on the Maha Nayaka of Asgiri Chapter Most Venerable Warakagoda Sri Gnanarathana Thera. The Minister briefed the Maha Nayakas about the proposed programs for the betterment of the Buddhasasana.
